Prebon got Spears' message and walked to Striker's cell. He peered in 
the hole.

"Ah, you are awake! And I should have remembered to pull out your 
transformation circuts. You would've have gotten out of your chains. 
I hope you like my new army member. Isn't she just precious? 
Fortunatly for you yo won't have to stay here long, unless my pan 
goes ill. If it does than you stay forever. Spears has already told 
me the answer to this question, but maybe she is low ranking and 
doesn't know the real answer. So I will ask you, and if you do not 
give me the correct answer I will terminate Spears. Who is the 
Maximal leader?"
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

"Alright, nic job Ramulus! But here we go...coming in back to 
Earth!!!"

Brix was able to pull the bottom up at the last second, letting the 
shuttle hit the ground evenly. I tall shook, neraly throwing the two 
soldiers out of their chairs. It went along the ground for a bit 
until finaly stopping just infront of the group. Brix Fliq and 
Ramulus had returned to Earth! Brix and Fliq got out of the shuttle 
to greet the group.

"Hey guys! We come bearing new computer boards and new hull. So 
what's this problem we have?"
